CustomField.description: This field is used to rank the level of influence of a contact tagged with the "Influencer Network Status" field. This ranking system classifies the strength of relationships of Active and Potential Influencers and is mainly used by the Political Affairs team but can be applied EDF- wide.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: High: Has wide scope of influence and/or has strong connections to Federal lawmakers. Medium: Has narrow scope of influence and has known connections to Federal lawmakers. Low: Has narrow scope of influence and no known connections to Federal lawmaker
CustomField.label: Influencer Network Rank
